definitions.definition: A retractable centreboard that slides out to act as a keel .
One of many decorative boards that form a valance for a canopy, particularly on older railway stations.

main_definition: ( nautical ) A retractable centreboard that slides out to act as a keel .
secondary_definitions: ( architecture ) One of many decorative boards that form a valance for a canopy, particularly on older railway stations.
